name: Space Rebase
description: SPACE measures the value of the Space Rebase Protocol and shareholders' trust in it's ability to maintain XUSD close to peg. XUSD is the main token of Space Rebase, pegging to the value of 1 USDC. SpaceShipX is a synthetics platform where you can earn extra yield on your favorite tokens. XSHARE token is the utility token in the SpaceShipX ecosystem.
